title: Pet Details Response
description: API response structure for GET /api/v1/announcements/:id (already implemented in backend). Used by iOS PetRepositoryImpl to fetch pet details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the pet (UUID format)

petName.description: Name of the pet (not displayed in current UI design)

photoUrl.description: URL to the pet's photo (nullable, show 'Image not available' fallback if null)

status.description: Status of the pet report (ACTIVE will be displayed as MISSING in UI)

lastSeenDate.description: Date when the pet was last seen (YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g., '2025-11-18')

gender.description: Sex of the pet (uppercase, displayed as ♂/♀/? symbols in UI)

description.description: Additional description about the pet (required, multi-line text allowed)
description.example: Zaginął piesek York wabi się Fredi Kamionka gmina burzenin

location.description: City where the pet was last seen (required)

phone.description: Owner's phone number (required). Displayed as tappable link opening dialer.

email.description: Owner's email address (optional). Displayed as tappable link opening mail composer.

locationRadius.description: Search radius around location in kilometers (optional, number). ViewModel formats to '±X km' for display.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when announcement was last updated (ISO 8601)
